test.name: Caso de Teste 01: Acessa ao menu "WOMEN"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (127.0.6533.88) detected in PATH at C:\Users\Larissa\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (128.0.6613.138); currently, chromedriver 128.0.6613.137 is recommended for chrome 128.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Dado que estou na home page do site www.automationpractice.pl/index.php
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Então o slide da pagina deve ficar "WOMEN"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: E Verificar se aparece o produto "Blouse"
Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

test.doc: Esse teste verificar o menu Women no site http://www.automationpractice.pl/index.php e o produto Blouse

test.name: Caso de Teste 02: Pesquisa de um produto

kw.name: Então a pagina seleciona os TOP SELLERS da categoria
